add secret to node-red github webhook for the telegraf container for HMAC signature verification
tasks.description:
We don’t want any client to be able to accidentally (or maliciously) trigger the webhook

https://docs.github.com/en/webhooks/using-webhooks/validating-webhook-deliveries

Github supports adding a secret for HMAC signatures, node-red has a decrypt/encrypt module.

  • Add secret to webhook

  • Test if it works

  • Modify node-red workflow to validate at the beginning of the flow chain

tasks.title: Walzen Server Control Panel
tasks.description:
Project Goal

Create a web application that facilitates managing the server, by offering automization for various repetitive tasks that are currently performed manual.

Tasks

  • Figure out frameworks to use

    • Select UI framework

    • Select UI style library

  • Panel to manage stacks

    • container autostart function similar to unraid

    • up all / down all stacks at once

  • Custom docker update page

    • update system for container stacks using portainer webhooks

    • list stacks that have updates ready (maybe can query portainer for this?)

  • Custom trigger for watchtowerr enabled containers

  • Access to RasPMI

    • reboot server

    • access KVM functionality

  • List of current ports in use
